member.summary: Asynchronously attempts to launch the current smart card app, passing the specified arguments.

member.returns: A Boolean value indicating if the app launched successfully.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.SmartCards.SmartCardTriggerDetails.TryLaunchCurrentAppAsync(System.String,Windows.Devices.SmartCards.SmartCardLaunchBehavior)

member.param: A string specifying the arguments to pass to the smart card app at launch.
The behavior to use when launching the app.
member.returns: A Boolean value indicating if the app launched successfully.
